level module¶

class level.level¶

Bases: object

Class that handles the game level drawing, collisions, loading level from file

draw_level(window, player)¶

Draws whole level, enemies, player in target window

is_level_beaten()¶

Checks if the level is beaten

load_level(path)¶

Loads level from path

make_proper_enemy_List()¶

Makes enemy objects list from list of strings

move_row(row)¶

Moves the rows randomly

move_rows()¶

Moves every enemy row

next_random_level()¶

Generates random level

random_enemy_attack()¶

Makes random enemy attack
